name: Escape From The Time (HinkirMunkur)
description:
DESCRIPTON:

     This game has made in 2 days for HUJAM GameJam.

Phase 1  PONG:

     In order to best this level you need to avoid the ball blocks and escape from them until one of the sides reach 10 score

Phase 2  TETRIS:

    In order to best this level you need to climb above and avoid getting stuck between falling blocks (sorry about the difficulty of this level :) we are going to make it easier)

Phase 3  Snake:

    In order to best this level you need to find a way for snake to hit itself.

Phase 4  Mario:

    It is just a creepy version of mario.

Have Fun !!!
